body_html:
Here is the code that tested with TF 1.9

summary_hook = tf.train.SummarySaverHook(save_steps=save_steps,
                                                 output_dir='summary',
                                                 summary_op=tf.summary.merge_all)

eval_results = self._estimator.evaluate(input_fn=self.validation_dataset, hooks=[summary_hook])
body_text:
Here is the code that tested with TF 1.9
summary_hook = tf.train.SummarySaverHook(save_steps=save_steps,
                                                 output_dir='summary',
                                                 summary_op=tf.summary.merge_all)

eval_results = self._estimator.evaluate(input_fn=self.validation_dataset, hooks=[summary_hook])
body:
Here is the code that tested with TF 1.9
```
summary_hook = tf.train.SummarySaverHook(save_steps=save_steps,
                                                 output_dir='summary',
                                                 summary_op=tf.summary.merge_all)

eval_results = self._estimator.evaluate(input_fn=self.validation_dataset, hooks=[summary_hook])
```
